casebody.data:
Jeholada J. Eagleston, president, &c. vs. Nathan A. Son. At special term, August, 1866. W. C. Traphagen, for the defendant. Chu/roUU §■ Wooclbury, for the plaintiff. _

Before Robertson, Ch. J.

Where a defendant is known as well by one name as another, he may be sued and arrested by either, and it is' immaterial by what name he was known to ■the plaintiffs in the action.
